plot: A prisoner receives the message that his old father needs help with tilling his field. In his unpromising situation the prisoner suddenly has the idea to use the guards to till his dad's land.
title: From Dad to Son
plot_es: A prisoner receives the message that his old father needs help with tilling his field. In his unpromising situation the prisoner suddenly has the idea to use the guards to till his dad's land.
plot_en: A prisoner receives the message that his old father needs help with tilling his field. In his unpromising situation the prisoner suddenly has the idea to use the guards to till his dad's land.
